children.text: Go back to the last checkpoint
children.name: R

children.text:
Switch between the 2 camera modes.
With the free camera you can zoom IN/OUT and rotate the level with the arrow keys.
children.name: SPACE

children.text: Rotate the ball to the left
children.name: LEFT

children.text:
Stop the rotation of the ball.
It's usefull when doing sharp movement.
children.name: DOWN

children.text: Rotate the ball to the right
children.name: RIGHT

children.text:
Jump in the direction the ball is rotating.
Look where the arrow on the ball is going for finners controls.
children.name: UP
